page.title: 12HOME LIFE IN PANTON
page.content: {PANTON }has a very small community and the family life within that community tends to be very traditional. In urban areas it would probably be considered very old fashioned with the wife cooking the meals and ensuring that her husband has them on time. In urban areas where the husband and wife might both be employed outside the home this pattern is being eroded. Where there are children in the house then the need to transport them to school det- ermines a fairly rigid routine as many travel on school transport which keeps to a strict timetable and if the children miss that transport then they usually have a day off school. Most domestic routines will have an early start because of the time needed to travel to work or school.
